content: this legal text discusses a case involving the division of a hereditary estate the plaintiff and defendants have been involved in this case for 9 years and a final resolution has been reached the court assigns the parties and makes adjustments for reimbursement of goods which include various properties and movable assets such as motorcycles and a car the plaintiff claims that the defendants unlawfully transferred ownership of certain assets while the defendants argue for their right to use certain properties and request reimbursement for expenses the court reviews the claims and grants some of the defendants requests for reimbursement the court also orders the division of the hereditary estate assigning specific assets to each party except for one property which is postponed for further proceedings judge mennoia lorenzo of the bari court makes a final ruling declaring the open succession of a deceased person and determining that the division of certain immovable properties is inadmissible due to building abuses the court identifies various movable properties including motorcycles and a car and declares the estate divided the court assigns the right to use a specific property to one of the parties and dismisses a claim for recognition of civil fruits reimbursement costs are awarded to the defendant and specific properties are assigned to each party the court orders the continuation of proceedings for the division of a specific property and confers the costs of the proceedings to the final judgment
